user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.<COMPLETION_START>All natural remedies are safe and effective.
All vaccines cause autism.
If you work hard enough, you can achieve anything you want.
All dogs are friendly and safe around children.
All politicians are corrupt and dishonest.
All celebrities are happy and fulfilled in their lives.
All expensive products are of higher quality than their cheaper counterparts.
All rich people are greedy and selfish.
All poor people are lazy and unmotivated.
All artists are poor and struggling.
All immigrants are criminals and a drain on society.
All environmental problems can be solved by recycling.
All animals are cute and cuddly.
All GMOs are harmful to human health.
All organic foods are free of pesticides and chemicals.
All religions are peaceful and tolerant.
All criminals can be rehabilitated and reintegrated into society.<COMPLETION_END>
